text: Tie Yinghua () is a Chinese kickboxer who competes in the Wu Lin Feng and Glory of Heroes organizations. As of July 2019, he is ranked the #10 featherweight in the world by Combat Press. == Championships and awards == * 2012 Wu Lin Feng 65kg Champion * * 2013 Wu Lin Feng 65kg Champion * * 2013 C1-K World Championship Runner-Up * * 2013 WLF 4-man Asian tournament Runner- Up * * 2015 Wu Lin Feng 67kg Champion * * 2018 Glory of Heroes 67kg Champion ==Kickboxing record== {| class="toccolours" width=100%
